verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshana pathra nenetthukoni sthuthula narpinthunu Harshinchi pogadi poojinthunu yesuni namaamunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papinaina nannu rakshimpanu siluvapai nakai thanekkenu Parishuddha jeevam nakivvanu mruthyunjayudai lechenu{/lang-eng}
